Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec Trichomonas vaginalis (TV) Qx Amplified DNA Assay
Regulation Name(s): Trichomonas vaginalis nucleic acid amplification test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Trichomonas vaginalis Qx Amplified DNA Assay using SDA technology on BD Viper System for detection of T. vaginalis DNA in female swab and urine specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Trichomonas vaginalis DNA in clinician-collected female endocervical swab specimens, patient-collected vaginal swab specimens (in a clinical setting), and female urine specimens; indicated for use with asymptomatic and symptomatic females to aid in diagnosis of trichomoniasis
